name: Chempace Corporation Gentle Giant RTU
description: Chempace Corporation Gentle Giant RTU is Chempace’s next generation of “Green Technology” ready to use cleaner. Our advanced formula is designed for use as a multi-purpose hard surface cleaner capable of removing stubborn industrial contaminants including grease and oil. Gentle Giant RTU is also effective and safe for use on soft surfaces such as carpets and fabrics. Gentle Giant RTU is pH neutral and readily biodegradable, non-hazardous*, and non-toxic*. Gentle Giant RTU dissolves oils and greases by lifting and emulsifying them for easy soil removal. Sizes available are: 32 fl. oz. spray bottles, 1 gallon jugs, 5 gallon pails, 55 gallon drums, 275 gallon totes, and 330 gallon totes.
